BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 - Practice (Japan.name: BS F-零大獎賽 2
BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 - Practice (Japan.original_desc: BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 is the direct sequel to the original F-Zero game released for the Super Famicom via the Satellaview. Two versions were released - a non-SoundLink game and a SoundLink game. The original non-SoundLink version was released as BSF-Zero 2 Practice on June 1, 1997 (although the title screen remained the same). It contained the four courses first seen throughout BS F-Zero Grand Prix (a Satellaview remake of the original), along with a new course called Mute City IV. Little is known about the later SoundLink version outside of surviving videos, but it was distributed in two halves in August 1997 and had a similar announcer and redone soundtrack as the previous Satellaview entry. At least the first week rearranged a few courses, and replaced two with new locations called "Forest I" and "Forest II". Presuming no areas were repeated, this likely means the SoundLink version had twice as many courses total. In addition, it can be seen that the player cannot choose between Grand Prix and Practice modes in the SoundLink version; as it was a live broadcast, the player is forced to play each course in a timed Practice mode, and then the Grand Prix race.
BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 - Practice (Japan.desc: BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 是通過 Satellaview 為 Super Famicom 發布的原版 F-Zero 遊戲的直接續集。發布了兩個版本 - 非 SoundLink 遊戲和 SoundLink 遊戲。最初的非 SoundLink 版本於 1997 年 6 月 1 日作為 BSF-Zero 2 Practice 發布（儘管標題屏幕保持不變）。它包含 BS F-Zero 大獎賽（原版 Satellaview 翻拍版）中首次出現的四個球場，以及名為 Mute City IV 的新球場。除了倖存的視頻之外，我們對後來的 SoundLink 版本知之甚少，但它於 1997 年 8 月分為兩半發行，並且與之前的 Satellaview 條目有類似的播音員和重做的配樂。至少第一周重新安排了一些課程，並用名為“森林 I”和“森林 II”的新地點替換了兩個課程。假設沒有重複的區域，這可能意味著 SoundLink 版本的課程總數是原來的兩倍。另外可以看出，SoundLink版本中玩家無法選擇Grand Prix和Practice模式；由於這是一場現場直播，玩家被迫以定時練習模式參加每個球場，然後參加大獎賽。

BS F-ZERO Grand Prix Ace League (J).key: BS F-ZERO Grand Prix Ace League (J)
BS F-ZERO Grand Prix Ace League (J).name: BS F-零大獎賽
BS F-ZERO Grand Prix Ace League (J).original_desc: BS F-Zero Grand Prix was a four-part Soundlink game to the original F-Zero. It was launched only in Japan for the Satellaview attachment for the Super Famicom. BS F-Zero Grand Prix contained four different playable vehicles and four new tracks near the end of each broadcast, as well as the 15 tracks from the original game. Commentary was provided by Bucky Koba, Tsutomu Tareki, and Seiichi Hirai. A follow-up to the game was later distributed as BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2.
BS F-ZERO Grand Prix Ace League (J).desc: BS F-Zero Grand Prix 是一款針對原版 F-Zero 的四部分 Soundlink 遊戲。它僅在日本推出，用於 Super Famicom 的 Satellaview 附件。BS F-Zero Grand Prix 包含四種不同的可玩車輛和每場廣播結束時的 4 條新賽道，以及原遊戲中的 15 條賽道。Bucky Koba、Tsutomu Tareki 和 Seiichi Hirai 提供評論。該遊戲的後續作品後來作為 BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 發行。

BS F-ZERO Grand Prix King League (J).key: BS F-ZERO Grand Prix King League (J)
BS F-ZERO Grand Prix King League (J).name: BS F-零大獎賽

BS Kirby no Omochabako - Baseball (J).name: Rby 的玩具盒 - 不當行為懲罰
BS Kirby no Omochabako - Baseball (J).original_desc: Kirby's Toy Box is the translated name of a small series of Kirby sub-games titled (Kabi no Omochabako, meaning Kirby's Toy Box) in Japan. The Kirby's Toy Box series was broadcast over Nintendo's first form of digital distribution, the Satellaview satellite network, and, depending on when the player connected to the network, different games were available at different times. These could be downloaded to the Satellaview base unit, or an 8-megabit rewritable "Memory Pak" ROM cartridge compatible with the Satellaview. As these games did not use the SoundLink live audio streaming technology utilized by other Satellaview games, after being downloaded, they could be played at any time after the broadcast as long as they were not deleted or overwritten.
BS Kirby no Omochabako - Baseball (J).desc: 《星之卡比的玩具盒》是卡比系列子遊戲（Kabi no Omochabako，意為《卡比的玩具盒》）在日本的譯名。《卡比的玩具盒》系列通過任天堂的第一種數字發行形式 Satellaview 衛星網絡播出，並且根據玩家連接到網絡的時間，在不同的時間提供不同的遊戲。這些可以下載到 Satellaview 基本單元，或與 Satellaview 兼容的 8 兆位可重寫“Memory Pak”ROM 盒。由於這些遊戲並沒有採用其他Satellaview遊戲所採用的SoundLink直播音頻流技術，因此下載後，只要不被刪除或覆蓋，就可以在播出後隨時玩。

BS Radical Dreamers (J) [T+Eng1.name: 激進的夢想家：Nusumenai Hōseki
BS Radical Dreamers (J) [T+Eng1.original_desc:
This text-based adventure (with some interesting background graphics) was originally released in Japan over the Satellaview system. The game is a spin-off from the Chrono Series, and was the precursor to Chrono Cross. It tells the story of Serge (travelling musician), Kid (thief), and Magil (wizard) as they attempt to steal the Frozen Flame from Viper Manor.  Contains multiple, often humorous endings. An interesting game for Chrono Trigger/Cross fans, as this was the game that Chrono Cross was essentially a remake of.

Gameplay is something between a standard text adventure and a Choose Your Own Adventure book.  Rather than having a full array of possible actions, players are limited to the several options it presents at any time.  With newly discovered items and information, new areas can be reached.  Occasionally battles will occur during the exploration, which are also handled by displaying several possible actions to choose between, such as "Run" or "Jump back as it swings!"
BS Radical Dreamers (J) [T+Eng1.desc:
這款基於文本的冒險遊戲（帶有一些有趣的背景圖形）最初通過 Satellaview 系統在日本發布。該遊戲是《Chrono》系列的衍生作品，也是《Chrono Cross》的前身。它講述了塞爾吉（旅行音樂家）、基德（小偷）和瑪吉爾（巫師）試圖從毒蛇莊園竊取冰凍火焰的故事。包含多個通常是幽默的結局。對於《Chrono Trigger/Cross》粉絲來說，這是一款有趣的遊戲，因為《Chrono Cross》本質上是這款遊戲的重製版。

遊戲玩法介於標准文本冒險和選擇你自己的冒險書籍之間。玩家並沒有擁有一整套可能的行動，而是受限於它隨時呈現的幾個選項。通過新發現的物品和信息，可以到達新的區域。探索過程中偶爾會發生戰鬥，這也可以通過顯示幾種可能的動作來處理，例如“跑”或“在擺動時跳回來！”

BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.key: BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - Dai-1-kai (Japan) (BS SoundLink)
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.original_name: Bs Super Mario Usa Power Challenge
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.name: Bs 超級馬里奧美國力量挑戰賽
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.original_desc: BS Super Mario USA Power Challenge is an ura- or gaiden-version of Super Mario Bros. 2 for the Satellaview system featuring graphical enhancements similar to its Super Mario All-Stars version. While the underlying gameplay itself is largely similar, some content has been rearranged and new content has been added. The game was released in four installments, in each of which the player is sent to a different SMB2 "World" to collect the Gold Mario Statues located in each level, defeat the boss, and then find and beat Wart, who can be battled in any world when going down in any vase while the player is in Subspace. The player can select the levels in any order and return to the levels as often as desired until the "episode" ends at around 50 minutes on the clock. The player starts the game as Mario, and character changing is forced in timed events. A points system was added. Points can be gained, among other things, by defeating enemies in various ways.
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.desc: BS Super Mario USA Power Challenge 是適用於 Satellaview 系統的《Super Mario Bros. 2》的 ura 或外傳版本，具有與 Super Mario All-Stars 版本類似的圖形增強功能。雖然底層遊戲玩法本身大致相似，但一些內容已重新排列並添加了新內容。遊戲分四期發行，每一期玩家都會被傳送到不同的SMB2“世界”，收集每個關卡中的黃金馬里奧雕像，擊敗Boss，然後找到並擊敗沃特，當玩家在子空間中時，沃特可以在任何世界中的任何花瓶中進行戰鬥。玩家可以按任意順序選擇關卡，並根據需要多次返回到關卡，直到“劇集”在 50 分鐘左右結束。玩家以馬里奧的身份開始遊戲，並在限時事件中強制改變角色。添加了積分系統。除其他外，可以通過以各種方式擊敗敵人來獲得積分。

BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.key: BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - Dai-2-kai (Japan) (BS SoundLink)
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.original_name: Bs Super Mario Usa Power Challenge

The player can select the levels in any order and return to the levels as often as desired until the "episode" ends at around 50 minutes on the clock. The player starts the game as Mario, and character changing is forced in timed events. A points system was added. Points can be gained, among other things, by defeating enemies in various ways.

BS-Zelda MottZilla Patch (v0.original_name: BS The Legend of Zelda - Ancient Stone Tablets
BS-Zelda MottZilla Patch (v0.name: BS 塞爾達傳說 - 古代石碑
BS-Zelda MottZilla Patch (v0.original_desc: The events of Ancient Stone Tablets occur a mere six years after the destruction of Ganon by the hero, Link in A Link to the Past. Hyrule is enjoying a time of peace and tranquility, but Princess Zelda suffers from a dark, recurring dream showing a shadow over a temple; a premonition of evil to come. One day, she witnesses a mysterious and brilliant light in the sky to the east. Aginah, the younger brother of the wise man Sahasrahla and now living in his old hideout near the Eastern Palace also witnesses such a light, and travels to investigate. There he finds a strange youth lying on the ground. Zelda, also following the light, meets up with Aginah, and they both carry the child to rest in Sahasrahla's hideout. Confused by the youth's unusual clothes, they believe the child not to hail from Kakariko Village. Speaking to Aginah while the youngster sleeps, Zelda learns that his brother Sahasrahla had also sensed danger surrounding Hyrule and had left the land to find the hero, Link. While Link has not yet returned, Zelda senses that if this new youth was endowed with courage, he or she may be the Hero of Light.Ancient Stone Tablets is different from most other Zelda games as the game's central heroes are actually the avatars of the player's ID for the BS-X Broadcasting System, drawn into Hyrule, which is also true for BS The Legend of Zelda. The difference being that this time the player does not take the place of Link, but takes part in a new tale set after the events of A Link to the Past. The male character wears a green tunic
BS-Zelda MottZilla Patch (v0.desc: 《遠古石碑》中的事件發生在《眾神的三角力量》中英雄林克摧毀加農僅僅六年後。海拉魯正在享受和平與安寧的時光，但塞爾達公主卻遭受了一個反復出現的黑暗夢境的困擾，夢境中出現了一座神廟的陰影；預感邪惡即將來臨。有一天，她目睹了東方天空中出現一道神秘而燦爛的光芒。阿吉娜（Aginah）是智者薩哈斯拉拉（Sahasrahla）的弟弟，現在住在東宮附近他以前的藏身處，也目睹了這樣的光，並前往調查。在那裡，他發現地上躺著一個奇怪的年輕人。塞爾達也追尋著光芒，與阿吉娜會面，他們倆帶著孩子在薩哈斯拉拉的藏身處休息。他們對這個年輕人不尋常的衣服感到困惑，認為這個孩子不是來自卡卡里科村。在年輕人熟睡時，塞爾達與阿吉娜交談，得知他的兄弟薩哈斯拉拉也感知到了海拉魯周圍的危險，並離開了這片土地去尋找英雄林克。雖然林克還沒有回來，塞爾達感覺到，如果這個新青年被賦予了勇氣，他或她可能會成為光之英雄。遠古石碑與大多數其他塞爾達遊戲不同，因為遊戲的中心英雄實際上是BS-X廣播系統的玩家ID的化身，被吸引到海拉魯，BS塞爾達傳說也是如此。不同之處在於，這次玩家並沒有取代林克，而是參與了《眾神的三角力量》事件之後的新故事。男性角色穿著綠色外衣

bszelda_ast1.original_name: BS The Legend of Zelda - Ancient Stone Tablets
bszelda_ast1.name: BS 塞爾達傳說 - 古代石碑
bszelda_ast1.original_desc: The events of Ancient Stone Tablets occur a mere six years after the destruction of Ganon by the hero, Link in A Link to the Past. Hyrule is enjoying a time of peace and tranquility, but Princess Zelda suffers from a dark, recurring dream showing a shadow over a temple; a premonition of evil to come. One day, she witnesses a mysterious and brilliant light in the sky to the east. Aginah, the younger brother of the wise man Sahasrahla and now living in his old hideout near the Eastern Palace also witnesses such a light, and travels to investigate. There he finds a strange youth lying on the ground. Zelda, also following the light, meets up with Aginah, and they both carry the child to rest in Sahasrahla's hideout. Confused by the youth's unusual clothes, they believe the child not to hail from Kakariko Village. Speaking to Aginah while the youngster sleeps, Zelda learns that his brother Sahasrahla had also sensed danger surrounding Hyrule and had left the land to find the hero, Link. While Link has not yet returned, Zelda senses that if this new youth was endowed with courage, he or she may be the Hero of Light.Ancient Stone Tablets is different from most other Zelda games as the game's central heroes are actually the avatars of the player's ID for the BS-X Broadcasting System, drawn into Hyrule, which is also true for BS The Legend of Zelda. The difference being that this time the player does not take the place of Link, but takes part in a new tale set after the events of A Link to the Past. The male character wears a green tunic
bszelda_ast1.desc: 《遠古石碑》中的事件發生在《眾神的三角力量》中英雄林克摧毀加農僅僅六年後。海拉魯正在享受和平與安寧的時光，但塞爾達公主卻遭受了一個反復出現的黑暗夢境的困擾，夢境中出現了一座神廟的陰影；預感邪惡即將來臨。有一天，她目睹了東方天空中出現一道神秘而燦爛的光芒。阿吉娜（Aginah）是智者薩哈斯拉拉（Sahasrahla）的弟弟，現在住在東宮附近他以前的藏身處，也目睹了這樣的光，並前往調查。在那裡，他發現地上躺著一個奇怪的年輕人。塞爾達也追尋著光芒，與阿吉娜會面，他們倆帶著孩子在薩哈斯拉拉的藏身處休息。他們對這個年輕人不尋常的衣服感到困惑，認為這個孩子不是來自卡卡里科村。在年輕人熟睡時，塞爾達與阿吉娜交談，得知他的兄弟薩哈斯拉拉也感知到了海拉魯周圍的危險，並離開了這片土地去尋找英雄林克。雖然林克還沒有回來，塞爾達感覺到，如果這個新青年被賦予了勇氣，他或她可能會成為光之英雄。遠古石碑與大多數其他塞爾達遊戲不同，因為遊戲的中心英雄實際上是BS-X廣播系統的玩家ID的化身，被吸引到海拉魯，BS塞爾達傳說也是如此。不同之處在於，這次玩家並沒有取代林克，而是參與了《眾神的三角力量》事件之後的新故事。男性角色穿著綠色外衣

bszelda_ast2.original_name: BS The Legend of Zelda - Ancient Stone Tablets
bszelda_ast2.name: BS 塞爾達傳說 - 古代石碑
bszelda_ast2.original_desc: The events of Ancient Stone Tablets occur a mere six years after the destruction of Ganon by the hero, Link in A Link to the Past. Hyrule is enjoying a time of peace and tranquility, but Princess Zelda suffers from a dark, recurring dream showing a shadow over a temple; a premonition of evil to come. One day, she witnesses a mysterious and brilliant light in the sky to the east. Aginah, the younger brother of the wise man Sahasrahla and now living in his old hideout near the Eastern Palace also witnesses such a light, and travels to investigate. There he finds a strange youth lying on the ground. Zelda, also following the light, meets up with Aginah, and they both carry the child to rest in Sahasrahla's hideout. Confused by the youth's unusual clothes, they believe the child not to hail from Kakariko Village. Speaking to Aginah while the youngster sleeps, Zelda learns that his brother Sahasrahla had also sensed danger surrounding Hyrule and had left the land to find the hero, Link. While Link has not yet returned, Zelda senses that if this new youth was endowed with courage, he or she may be the Hero of Light.Ancient Stone Tablets is different from most other Zelda games as the game's central heroes are actually the avatars of the player's ID for the BS-X Broadcasting System, drawn into Hyrule, which is also true for BS The Legend of Zelda. The difference being that this time the player does not take the place of Link, but takes part in a new tale set after the events of A Link to the Past. The male character wears a green tunic

Chrono Trigger - Character Zukan (Japan).name: 計時觸發器：噴氣自行車特別版
Chrono Trigger - Character Zukan (Japan).original_desc: BS Chrono Trigger: Character Library is essentially a bestiary containing not only all of the playable characters, but all of the enemies as well. The game was released for the Japan only Satellaview in 1995, and was developed by Squaresoft and published by Nintendo. The game is nothing more than an addon to Chrono Trigger, containing every sprite for each character and enemy, as well as a brief description of each one. BS Chrono Trigger: Character Library is also included in Final Fantasy Chronicles.
Chrono Trigger - Character Zukan (Japan).desc: BS Chrono Trigger：角色庫本質上是一本動物寓言集，不僅包含所有可玩角色，還包含所有敵人。該遊戲於1995年在日本唯一的Satellaview發行，由Squaresoft開發並由任天堂發行。該遊戲只不過是《時空之輪》的一個插件，包含每個角色和敵人的每個精靈，以及每個精靈的簡短描述。BS Chrono Trigger：角色庫也包含在《最終幻想編年史》中。

Chrono Trigger - Jet Bike Special (Japan.name: 計時觸發器：噴氣自行車特別版
Chrono Trigger - Jet Bike Special (Japan.original_desc: BS Chrono Trigger: Character Library is essentially a bestiary containing not only all of the playable characters, but all of the enemies as well. Dezaemon BSX Version - BS-X Shooting (Ja.name: Dezaemon Bsx 版本 - Bs-x 射擊

Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.key: Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadium 1 (Japan) (BS SoundLink)
Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.name: Excitebike - Bun Bun 馬里奧之戰
Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.original_desc: BS Excitebike Bun Bun Mario Stadium was the a game released in four downloadable versions on the Satellaview download service. The game is also known as Mario Excitebike. It was released for the Satellaview in 1996 only in Japan, and is the obscure sequel to the NES game Excitebike. Each version added a number of new characters, eventually adding up to six characters in all. The game plays similarly to Excitebike on the NES, although it does have a couple differences. One difference is the fact that the player can pick up coins along the racetrack (which do nothing besides adding to the score). The only other change was an added SUPER mode, which gave the player infinite boost.
Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.desc: BS Excitebike Bun Bun Mario Stadium 是一款在 Satellaview 下載服務上發布了四個可下載版本的遊戲。該遊戲也被稱為《馬里奧興奮自行車》。它於 1996 年在 Satellaview 上僅在日本發行，是 NES 遊戲 Excitebike 的默默無聞的續集。每個版本都添加了許多新角色，最終總共增加了六個角色。該遊戲的玩法與 NES 上的 Excitebike 類似，但也有一些差異。一個區別是玩家可以沿著賽道拾取硬幣（除了增加分數之外沒有任何作用）。唯一的其他變化是增加了超級模式，這給了玩家無限的提升。

Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.key: Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadium 2 (Japan) (BS SoundLink)

Golf Daisuki! O.name: 我愛你！哦。b.庫布
Golf Daisuki! O.original_desc:
Golf Daisuki! O.B. Club is a view-limited Downloadable golfing game for the Satellaview initially running between August 10, 1997 and August 23, 1997. The game was rebroadcast for at least 4 runs ending in March 30, 1998.
Electronic Gaming Monthly magazine produced a preview of this game. Their preview had an English-language logo even though the game was never released in the USA in any form.
Golf Daisuki! O.desc:
高爾夫大壽！O.B. Club 是一款針對 Satellaview 的觀看次數有限的可下載高爾夫遊戲，最初於 1997 年 8 月 10 日至 1997 年 8 月 23 日期間運行。該遊戲在 1998 年 3 月 30 日結束時至少重播了 4 次。
《電子遊戲月刊》雜誌製作了這款遊戲的預覽。他們的預覽版有一個英文徽標，儘管該遊戲從未以任何形式在美國發行。

Kaizou Chounin Shubibinman Zero (Japan).name: 改良型超人舒比賓曼零式
Kaizou Chounin Shubibinman Zero (Japan).original_desc:
A sequel to the Shubibinman Turbografx action platformers developed exclusively for the SNES.

A new gang of cyborg-enhanced goons threatens peace in the city, so "Doc" decides to test his newest creations: Raita and Azuki, by sending them to destroy all the baddies and restore peace.

The game plays as an 2D action platformer as previous entries in the series, in which you proceed through each stage pummeling enemies and collecting power-ups to enhance your powers. Now for the first time each character has unique abilities and attacks, furthermore each character has a charging attack that can be used to energize your partner thus encouraging teamplay in the two-player cooperative mode.
Kaizou Chounin Shubibinman Zero (Japan).desc:
專為 SNES 開發的 Shubibinman Turbografx 動作平台遊戲的續作。

一群新的半機械人強化暴徒威脅著城市的和平，因此“Doc”決定測試他的最新作品：Raita 和 Azuki，派遣他們消滅所有壞人並恢復和平。

該遊戲與該系列之前的作品一樣，都是一款 2D 動作平台遊戲，在每個階段中，你都需要不斷地打擊敵人並收集能量來增強你的力量。現在，每個角色第一次擁有獨特的能力和攻擊，此外，每個角色都有衝鋒攻擊，可以用來激勵你的伙伴，從而鼓勵兩人合作模式下的團隊合作。

Kirby no Omochabako - Hoshi Kuzushi (Jap.name: RBY 的玩具盒 - Star Break

Konae-chan no Dokidoki Penguin Kazoku (J.name: 粉A醬令人興奮的企鵝家族
Konae-chan no Dokidoki Penguin Kazoku (J.original_desc: Konae-chan no DokiDoki Pengin Kazoku is a Downloadable Event Game developed by Pax Softnica for the Satellaview. It stars Konae and was distributed as a tie in to the Radio Program "If Tomorrow Comes...".
Konae-chan no Dokidoki Penguin Kazoku (J.desc: Konae-chan no DokiDoki Pengin Kazoku 是 Pax Softnica 為 Satellaview 開發的一款可下載活動遊戲。它由 Konae 主演，並作為廣播節目“如果明天到來......”的配套發行。

BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.key: BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - Dai-4-kai (Japan) (BS SoundLink)
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.original_name: Bs Super Mario Usa Power Challenge
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.name: Bs 超級馬里奧美國力量挑戰賽
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.original_desc: BS Super Mario USA Power Challenge is an ura- or gaiden-version of Super Mario Bros. 2 for the Satellaview system featuring graphical enhancements similar to its Super Mario All-Stars version. While the underlying gameplay itself is largely similar, some content has been rearranged and new content has been added. The game was released in four installments, in each of which the player is sent to a different SMB2 "World" to collect the Gold Mario Statues located in each level, defeat the boss, and then find and beat Wart, who can be battled in any world when going down in any vase while the player is in Subspace. The player can select the levels in any order and return to the levels as often as desired until the "episode" ends at around 50 minutes on the clock. The player starts the game as Mario, and character changing is forced in timed events. A points system was added. Points can be gained, among other things, by defeating enemies in various ways.
BS Super Mario USA - Power Challenge - D.desc: BS Super Mario USA Power Challenge 是適用於 Satellaview 系統的《Super Mario Bros. 2》的 ura 或外傳版本，具有與 Super Mario All-Stars 版本類似的圖形增強功能。雖然底層遊戲玩法本身大致相似，但一些內容已重新排列並添加了新內容。遊戲分四期發行，每一期玩家都會被傳送到不同的SMB2“世界”，收集每個關卡中的黃金馬里奧雕像，擊敗Boss，然後找到並擊敗沃特，當玩家在子空間中時，沃特可以在任何世界中的任何花瓶中進行戰鬥。玩家可以按任意順序選擇關卡，並根據需要多次返回到關卡，直到“劇集”在 50 分鐘左右結束。玩家以馬里奧的身份開始遊戲，並在限時事件中強制改變角色。添加了積分系統。除其他外，可以通過以各種方式擊敗敵人來獲得積分。

Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.key: Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadium 3 (Japan) (xxxx-02-08) (BS SoundLink)
Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.name: Excitebike - Bun Bun 馬里奧之戰
Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.original_desc: BS Excitebike Bun Bun Mario Stadium was the a game released in four downloadable versions on the Satellaview download service. The game is also known as Mario Excitebike. It was released for the Satellaview in 1996 only in Japan, and is the obscure sequel to the NES game Excitebike. Each version added a number of new characters, eventually adding up to six characters in all. The game plays similarly to Excitebike on the NES, although it does have a couple differences. One difference is the fact that the player can pick up coins along the racetrack (which do nothing besides adding to the score). The only other change was an added SUPER mode, which gave the player infinite boost.
Excitebike - Bunbun Mario Battle - Stadi.desc: BS Excitebike Bun Bun Mario Stadium 是一款在 Satellaview 下載服務上發布了四個可下載版本的遊戲。該遊戲也被稱為《馬里奧興奮自行車》。它於 1996 年在 Satellaview 上僅在日本發行，是 NES 遊戲 Excitebike 的默默無聞的續集。每個版本都添加了許多新角色，最終總共增加了六個角色。該遊戲的玩法與 NES 上的 Excitebike 類似，但也有一些差異。一個區別是玩家可以沿著賽道拾取硬幣（除了增加分數之外沒有任何作用）。唯一的其他變化是增加了超級模式，這給了玩家無限的提升。

Mario Paint - Yuushou Naizou Ban (Japan).name: Mario Pine T - Winner 內置版

New Yatterman - Nandai Kandai Yajirobee.name: 嘿哈哈 Yajirobei - 艱鉅的任務令人印象深刻。
New Yatterman - Nandai Kandai Yajirobee.original_desc:
New Yatterman: Nandai Kandai Yajirobee is a multiplayer-focused game for the Super Famicom that is based on the 1970s Yatterman anime franchise.

Yatterman features a team of three heroes, all called Yatterman, who attempt to beat the supervillain team Doronbo (also a group of three) to a set of skull coins which will reveal the way to a giant treasure horde. The heroes often use toys and mechs to defeat their incompetent opponents, such as the male protagonist's kendamagic.

The game is similar to First Star's Spy vs. Spy series, in that both teams are attempting to reach the treasure first. They can trip up their opponents via a number of traps, some of which have conditional uses. By burying mines and setting off missiles, the player can whittle down the health of their opponents as well as keep them off their tracks. If the two teams meet, they fight each other in a three-on-three tag team battle with the losing side taking a large hit to their health. The game can be played single-player (as either the Yatterman team or the Doronbo team) or multiplayer.
New Yatterman - Nandai Kandai Yajirobee.desc:
New Yatterman: Nandai Kandai Yajirobee 是 Super Famicom 的一款多人遊戲，基於 1970 年代 Yatterman 動漫系列。

《亞特曼》的主角是一支由三名英雄組成的隊伍，他們都叫亞特曼，他們試圖擊敗超級惡棍多倫博隊伍（也是三人組），獲得一套骷髏硬幣，這將揭示通往巨大寶藏部落的道路。英雄們經常使用玩具和機甲來擊敗無能的對手，例如男主角的劍魔。

該遊戲類似於 First Star 的 Spy vs. Spy 系列，兩隊都試圖首先到達寶藏。他們可以通過許多陷阱絆倒對手，其中一些陷阱有條件使用。通過埋設地雷和引爆導彈，玩家可以削弱對手的生命值並讓他們偏離軌道。如果兩隊相遇，他們會進行三對三的雙打比賽，失敗的一方會受到很大的生命值打擊。該遊戲可以單人遊戲（Yatterman 團隊或 Doronbo 團隊）或多人遊戲。

Panel de Pon - Event '98 (Japan) (BS).name: 小組 De Pon - 活動 '98
Panel de Pon - Event '98 (Japan) (BS).original_desc: Panel de Pon Event '98 is a Downloadable game for the Satellaview that was broadcast on January 31, 1998, it is a slightly modified event version of the game Panel de Pon.
Panel de Pon - Event '98 (Japan) (BS).desc: Panel de Pon Event '98 是一款適用於 Satellaview 的可下載遊戲，於 1998 年 1 月 31 日播出，它是遊戲 Panel de Pon 的稍微修改的事件版本。

Shanghai - Banri no Choujou (Japan) (BS).name: 商杯——中國峰會
Shanghai - Banri no Choujou (Japan) (BS).original_desc: Shanghai: Banri no Choujou is a view-limited Downloadable game for the Satellaview that was broadcast between November 15, 1998 and November 28, 1998.
Shanghai - Banri no Choujou (Japan) (BS).desc: 上海：萬里的少女是Satellaview的一款觀看次數有限的可下載遊戲，於1998年11月15日至1998年11月28日期間播出。

Special Tee Shot (Japan) (BS).name: 特別開球
Special Tee Shot (Japan) (BS).original_desc:
BS Special Tee Shot is a game that was planned to be released on the SNES, though eventually was just made exclusively for the Super Famicom's Satellaview service. The game was later retooled and made into the game that is known as Kirby's Dream Course. It is unknown why the game was remade to feature Kirby characters, though it's presumed that it as because Nintendo thought that the game would prove more successful with a well known brand behind it.
The Satellaview video game had unique characters rather than already developed ones. Overall, however, the player character was uninspiring as it was simply just a red sphere that bounced around. Despite the fact that the game would be remade to feature Kirby characters, there are dramatic differences between the two titles, including the overall gameplay concept and levels. For example, in this game, the goal was simply to shoot the ball in the hole, while in the Kirby game you want to crash into enemies to destroy them. However, despite this, the games still share many similarities, such as graphics and the overall way the player controls the ball.

Interestingly, Special Tee Shot was featured not only in magazines but also on the back of SNES packages as advertisements before ultimately being cancelled and brought back with Kirby characters. It should also be noted that before being titled Kirby's Dream Course, the game was officially called Kirby's Tee Shot.
Special Tee Shot (Japan) (BS).desc:
BS Special Tee Shot 是一款原計劃在 SNES 上發布的遊戲，但最終只是專門為 Super Famicom 的 Satellaview 服務製作。該遊戲後來被重新設計並製成了被稱為卡比的夢想球場的遊戲。目前尚不清楚為什麼這款遊戲被重製以卡比角色為特色，但據推測這是因為任天堂認為這款遊戲如果有一個知名品牌的支持會更成功。
Satellaview 視頻遊戲擁有獨特的角色，而不是已經開發的角色。然而，總的來說，玩家角色並沒有什麼吸引力，因為它只是一個四處彈跳的紅色球體。儘管遊戲將被重製以卡比角色為特色，但這兩款遊戲之間仍然存在巨大差異，包括整體遊戲概念和關卡。例如，在這款遊戲中，目標只是將球射入洞中，而在卡比遊戲中，你想要撞上敵人並消滅他們。然而，儘管如此，這些遊戲仍然有許多相似之處，例如圖形和玩家控球的整體方式。

有趣的是，Special Tee Shot 不僅出現在雜誌中，還作為廣告出現在 SNES 包裝背面，但最終被取消並與卡比角色一起回歸。還應該指出的是，在命名為“卡比的夢想球場”之前，該遊戲的正式名稱為“卡比的開球”。

Sutte Hakkun - 98 Fuyu Event Version (Ja.name: Sutte Hakkun - 98 冬活動版
Sutte Hakkun - 98 Fuyu Event Version (Ja.original_desc: Sutte Hakkun BS Version 2 is a platform/puzzle game that was released in 1998 in Japan. As the game's title implies, it is a sequel of sorts to the earlier Sutte Hakkun (Nov. 1997) and Sutte Hakkun Event Version (Oct. 1997). A later titles in the same series, Sutte Hakkun '98 (Dec. 1998) followed a month after the broadcast of Sutte Hakkun Version 2
Sutte Hakkun - 98 Fuyu Event Version (Ja.desc: Sutte Hakkun bs 版本 2 是一款平台/益智遊戲，於 1998 年在日本發行。正如游戲的標題所暗示的那樣，它是早期 sutte（1997 年 11 月）和 sutte hakkun 事件版本（1997 年 10 月）的續集。同一系列的後續作品《Sutte Hakkun '98》（1998 年 12 月）在 Sutte hakkun 版本播出一個月後推出

Waiwai Check 3-21 Saihousou + Yuki no Wa.desc: WaiWai Check 是一本可下載的數字雜誌，於 1995 年在 Satellaview 上至少分為 3 個部分播出。

BS Radical Dreamers (J) [T+Eng1.2_Demifo.original_desc:
This text-based adventure (with some interesting background graphics) was originally released in Japan over the Satellaview system. The game is a spin-off from the Chrono Series, and was the precursor to Chrono Cross. It tells the story of Serge (travelling musician), Kid (thief), and Magil (wizard) as they attempt to steal the Frozen Flame from Viper Manor.  Contains multiple, often humorous endings. An interesting game for Chrono Trigger/Cross fans, as this was the game that Chrono Cross was essentially a remake of.

Gameplay is something between a standard text adventure and a Choose Your Own Adventure book.  Rather than having a full array of possible actions, players are limited to the several options it presents at any time.  With newly discovered items and information, new areas can be reached.  Occasionally battles will occur during the exploration, which are also handled by displaying several possible actions to choose between, such as "Run" or "Jump back as it swings!"

BS-Zelda MottZilla Patch (v0.95) (Eng).original_name: BS The Legend of Zelda - Ancient Stone Tablets
BS-Zelda MottZilla Patch (v0.95) (Eng).original_desc: The events of Ancient Stone Tablets occur a mere six years after the destruction of Ganon by the hero, Link in A Link to the Past. Hyrule is enjoying a time of peace and tranquility, but Princess Zelda suffers from a dark, recurring dream showing a shadow over a temple; a premonition of evil to come. One day, she witnesses a mysterious and brilliant light in the sky to the east. Aginah, the younger brother of the wise man Sahasrahla and now living in his old hideout near the Eastern Palace also witnesses such a light, and travels to investigate. There he finds a strange youth lying on the ground. Zelda, also following the light, meets up with Aginah, and they both carry the child to rest in Sahasrahla's hideout. Confused by the youth's unusual clothes, they believe the child not to hail from Kakariko Village. Speaking to Aginah while the youngster sleeps, Zelda learns that his brother Sahasrahla had also sensed danger surrounding Hyrule and had left the land to find the hero, Link. While Link has not yet returned, Zelda senses that if this new youth was endowed with courage, he or she may be the Hero of Light.Ancient Stone Tablets is different from most other Zelda games as the game's central heroes are actually the avatars of the player's ID for the BS-X Broadcasting System, drawn into Hyrule, which is also true for BS The Legend of Zelda. The difference being that this time the player does not take the place of Link, but takes part in a new tale set after the events of A Link to the Past. The male character wears a green tunic

Golf Daisuki! O.B. Club (Japan) (BS).original_desc:
Golf Daisuki! O.B. Club is a view-limited Downloadable golfing game for the Satellaview initially running between August 10, 1997 and August 23, 1997. The game was rebroadcast for at least 4 runs ending in March 30, 1998.
Electronic Gaming Monthly magazine produced a preview of this game. Their preview had an English-language logo even though the game was never released in the USA in any form.
